import React , { useState} from "react"; import "rc-slider/assets/index.css"; import Slider from "./slider"; export default function Report() { const [formReport, setFormReport] = useState({ name: "", phone: "", email: "", website: "", goal:"", method:"", }); const handleInput = (e) => { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setFormReport({ ...formReport, [name]: value }); }; return (
Campaign Budget
Preferred method of communication
Which channel(s) are you most interested in?
) }
